post.title: Band Booster Newsletter with Important Reminders & Updates
post.description: As another marching band season comes to an end, I would like to thank the Concessions Chairs - Moni
post.content:
As another marching band season comes to an end, I would like to thank the Concessions Chairs - Monica Hrin, Darlene Kelly and Tammy Patrick, Hospitality Chair - Amanda Kost, Membership Chairs - Shirley Berish and Rima Chehade, Festival of Bands Chair – Beth Burdick, Visiting Band Chair - Kim Kozempa, 50/50 Chair - Elisa Race, Chaperone Chairs - Susanna Schwab and Lynn Marencik, Badge a Minute Chair - Nancy Chester, Uniform Chairs - Michelle Kelly, Vicky Turske and Anthony Amato, and Pit Crew Chiefs Bob Franko and Rich Hrin for all your time, dedication and commitment to our program and our kids! What a fantastic season it has been!

IMPORTANT REMINDERS & UPDATES:

Marching Band Uniform Turn In –

Turn in is this Friday (11/21) from 6pm to 8pm and Monday (11/24) 6pm to 8pm in the NEW UNIFORM ROOM, ROOM 310.

Marching Band Concert CDs and 25th Anniversary T-shirts -

Orders are due Friday (11/21). You can download the order forms from the homepage of the Booster website, northroyaltonbandboosters.com.

Band Booster Meeting –

Our next meeting is Monday, November 24, at 7pm in the High School Community Room. This is the last meeting until January.

Fruit Sale Update -

Right now we are on the schedule with Florida River Groves to have our fruit delivered the first week in December. We will not have a more accurate date until right around that time. Keep watching your email, the band website and Facebook for updates.

Holiday Concerts -

Our holiday concerts will be Sunday, Dec.14th at 2pm and 7pm and Monday, Dec. 15th at 7pm. The ticket order form can be found on Mr. Vitale’s website under Forms & PDFs. Make sure to order tickets for the correct concert. Different bands play at different concerts. For example the Freshmen/Concert band plays in both the concerts on Sunday, but not in the concert on Monday. Also, Remember to subtract the cost of 2 tickets if you joined Band Boosters at a level that included tickets. There is a line for that on the form.

Holiday Ornaments -

Holiday Ornaments will only be sold at the Holiday Concerts this year (December 14 and 15). They will be $10 each. See the attached flyer for a picture.

BandOrnament-11-2014.pdf (104.1KB)

Raffle Fundraiser Event -

SAVE THE DATE! The Band Booster Raffle Fundraiser Event will be on Saturday, February 28, at the 3 Spot. More information will be coming soon.

States DVDs –

Unfortunately, BandVideos had a power outage during our performance at States. They are no longer taking orders for DVDs. If you ordered a DVD they are refunding the $30 and they will also be sending a DVD of the parts of the performance that they have. Kevin Brewer posted a video of the performance here 2014 North Royalton State Marching Band Competition. A Seasonal Celebration.

We look forward to hearing the bands this holiday season. Stay warm and safe! Be glad we don't live in Buffalo!

Holly Michalke
